title: Yue Liang's resume
author: Yue Liang
description: Looking for a full-time job as a software engineer

educations.degree: Master of Science in Computer Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering

projects.title: LiQuiz
descriptions: Designed a calendar and quiz UI by the use of HTML, JavaScript and AJAX
Support multiple simultaneous connections with real-time response
Used Git version control system to track progress and collaborate
Was a good team player, project website: https://sites.google.com/site/liquizyy/
projects.tech: JAVA, Git, JavaScript, AJAX, HTML, JSON

projects.title: Cloud Storage and Rating System
descriptions: Developed the website backend framework based on MVC concept and Apache Tomcat
Designed and implemented the database schema on MySQL to store user info and file metadata
Cached data in server based on LRU, handling large scale requests with high performance
Built a PC client by using Java Swing GUI and AWS SDK for java
projects.tech: AWS S3, Servlet/JSP, Apache Tomcat, MVC, JDBC, MySQL

projects.title: Data Communication Based on 3G Module
descriptions: Developed a software for transmitting data in peer-to-peer wireless network by using C# in support of sending different type files regularly and sending short message (SMS)
Reached 13kb/s maximum download/upload speed without any errors on public 3G network
Created 3 data structures for maintaining connectivity and transmitting data

careers.title: Teaching Assistant
contributions: Graded assignments and helped students to understand lectures and assignments

careers.title: Software Engineer (Sumer Internship)
contributions: Created and modified the test cases, designed the acceptance criteria for each test case and executed the tests according to the test cases
